list.comment: Various bug fixes, conversions to kotlin. Rating cheat works again using callbacks.

task.summary: Default task
Move RestApi object creation away from MainActivity to the child-fragments.
Displaying the amount of unpublished and published cheats int he "my fragments" view. Error in MainActivity when logging out, some fragments crash...
Fixing login/logout refresh behavior for "myCheats" view. logging out removes the count. Loggin in refreshes the drawer and fragment with the cheats count numbers.
Fixing strings.xml cheatList -> cheats Fixing favorites empty view bug Improving "my cheats" view with counter
Release Version 2.5.18 (+ library updates)
Make rejected cheat alertdialog less transparent Add bottom padding for unpublished cheats recyclerview
Fix favorites list data getting lost on display rotation. Add scrollview to "my cheats" view for better landscape mode.
STARTED (again) USING #HILT! This time it's working!
More migration to using HILT
Remove unused Helper.java and RestRepository.java classes.
Add NetworkModule class
Retrofit is now almost completely injected with HILT. Except in Dialog classes where it's not possible yet.
Trying to get Fragment Injection (Hilt) to work. NOT WORKING! - Add: MainFragmentFactory.kt - Add: MainFragmentFactoryEntryPoint.kt - Add: MainNavHostFragment.kt
SystemListFragment HILT injections (ohne factory) andere fragments kann man noch einbauen.
Kotlin Fixes
Working on Espresso Tests
Click on EDIT icon in "my cheats" goes to (non-existent) "edit cheat" form.
Adding EditCheatActivity (MVVM) - still empty...
Added link from my own cheats -> edit cheat activity
Updating project to Android Studio 4.1. Working on the "edit cheat" form layout.
Working on "edit cheat" layout.
Upgrading libraries, switching from Fabric to Firebase Crashlytics.
Version with MVVM SystemConsoleListFragment.kt and Repository pattern. WORKING (except clicking a system when you get forawarded to GamesBySystemListActivity)
System List Fragment neu mit: Kotlin, Coroutines, MVVM, Offlince Room Caching
Get started with the Navigation Component
Started with Navigation Component, created MyCheatsViewModel.kt layer.
Navigation Component: Fixing bugs with the fragments inside the nav controller
Navigation Component: Almost finished!
Move bottom banner ads from MainActivity to the Fragments
Get rid of startActivityForResult() everywhere (using the new "registerForActivityResult" method)
Adding some info dialog when submitting a cheat to hopefully avoid the Google ban??
Excluding everything Android and iOS.
Removed flawed caching from GamesBySystemListActivity
Fix the inconsistency bug with "achievements" filter.
Added DistinctValues.java for Huawei flavor
Fixing some small bugs
Many changes, adjustments towards latest android + kotlin
Adapter in kotlin umwandeln und viewbinding einbauen
Updating JUnit Tests
Cleaning up code, adding banner ads
Apploving native ads implementation (noch nicht fertig)
Apploving native ads implementiert (FUNKTIONIEREN) StfalconImageViewer auskommentiert, da gradle es nicht mehr laden kann. suche nach alternativen...
Facebook ads entfernt, inmobi dependencies entfernt alles auf applovin umgestellt bug fixes
Fixing many crashes Fixing the dimming bug when displaying a dialog
Share Cheat dialog geupdatet
Share Cheat dialog geupdatet
Android & iOS wieder hinzugefügt, da ja eh nicht mehr auf Google Play VERSION 2.7.2 (08.01.2022)
Various bug fixes, conversions to kotlin. Rating cheat works again using callbacks.
